data.title: 1-week quality sprint: dashboard type-safety, lint gate, and reliability checks

data.body: Review pass against CTX-20 Day 1-2 scope. Implemented top items: (1) removed dashboard lint blockers by replacing explicit any usage across server/charts and fixing DepthComparison static-component issue, (2) made lint blocking by updating root check script and CI quality-gate. Verification: bun run dashboard:lint passed; bun run check passed (tests + lint + dashboard build). Note: for react-refresh/only-export-components in FilterContext, used file-local eslint suppressions on hook exports rather than splitting modules; functionally equivalent for lint gate and can be revisited in Day 7 cleanup.
